resources.string: Upload will start when server is reachable
Upload will start when internet is available

Invalid document ID. Please go back and open the document again.
Do you really want to delete this document?
Do you really want to delete the label \"%1$s\"?
The label \"%1$s\" is assigned to %2$d documents. Deleting it will remove it from all documents.
The label \"%1$s\" is assigned to 1 document. Deleting it will remove it from that document.
The label \"%1$s\" is not assigned to any documents.
Scan documents to see them here
Your server uses Cloudflare (100s timeout limit). Uploading %d pages as single PDF may timeout on slow connections.
⚠️ Recommendation: Use WiFi or select \"Separate Documents\"
Drag the corners to select the area

A debug report was created for your recent login attempt. This anonymized report helps us diagnose issues.

No passwords or personal data are included.

Copy the report to paste it in a GitHub issue.
Server does not support custom fields
Too many failed attempts. Please wait and try again later.
Too many failed attempts. Please clear app data in system settings.

Your credentials and documents will be transmitted unencrypted. Others on the same network could intercept the data.
Don\'t ask again for this server
Server address could not be resolved. Please check the server URL in settings.
Server is unreachable. Please check if the server is running.
Server is not responding. Please try again later.
SSL certificate error. Please check the certificate (expired, self-signed, or hostname mismatch).
VPN connection required. Please enable VPN and try again.
Server connection failed. Please check settings.
Position the token in the frame
To scan the token, the app needs access to your camera
Auto detection active • Tap manually as fallback
Hold the camera steady - Auto detection running
We collect anonymized usage data to improve the app. No personal data is collected.
Anonymized data to improve the app
You are using AI features intensively (%1$d of 300 calls this month). Keep an eye on your usage!
You have used %1$d of 300 AI calls this month. The limit will be reached soon.
You have reached your monthly AI limit of 300 calls.\n\nSuggestions are now based on the Paperless server and local data.
AI limit reached • Paperless Suggestions active
Use AI features only on WiFi connection
AI can suggest tags that don\'t exist yet
AI suggestions only available on WiFi (setting active)
AI analysis uses image data and is only available on WiFi to save mobile data. You can change this setting under \"Settings → AI Assistant\".
AI analyzes your documents and suggests matching tags
Detects if invoice, contract, letter, etc.

Great! All current documents have tags.
You have tagged %1$d documents. Well done!
These tags don\'t exist yet. Tap to create them.

Password must be at least 4 characters
Too many failed attempts. You have been logged out.
The app will no longer be protected.
The \"Suggest New Tags\" setting is disabled. Enable it in settings to receive new tag suggestions.
No tags created yet.\nTap \"New Label\" above to get started.
No correspondents created yet.\nTap \"Create Correspondent\" above to get started.
No document types created yet.\nTap \"Create Document Type\" above to get started.
No custom fields created yet.\nTap \"Create Field\" above to get started.
Deleted documents are kept here for 30 days
All %1$d documents will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
The server \"%1$s\" is using a self-signed SSL certificate that cannot be verified.
Accepting this certificate allows unverified connections to this server. Only proceed if you trust this server and understand the security implications.
You can still unlock with biometrics
Adjust server URL, token or credentials
Enter your server details to get started
Find your token in Paperless Settings → API Tokens\nOr scan it with the QR code scanner
Use your Paperless-ngx username and password
Enter your current password and choose a new password.
Choose a password to protect your app. The password must be at least 4 characters long.

Too many requests - please try again later
Invalid IPv4 address. Octet values must be 0-255.
Server error - please try again later
New password must be at least %1$d characters
Some files could not be saved
A file is too large (%1$s). Maximum per file: %2$s
Not enough storage space. Available: %1$s, Required: %2$s
No app found to open file
PDF could not be created - no pages added
PDF file was not created correctly
Firebase AI not configured. Please enable Vertex AI in Firebase Console.
AI analysis timeout. Please try again.
AI quota exhausted. Please try again later.
Could not load image from URI
No valid JSON found in response
Analyze this document and extract metadata.

Respond ONLY with a JSON object in the following format: { \"title\": \"Short, descriptive title of the document\", \"tags\": [\"tag1\", \"tag2\"], \"correspondent\": \"Name of sender/correspondent or null\", \"document_type\": \"Document type or null\", \"date\": \"YYYY-MM-DD or null\", \"confidence\": 0.0-1.0, \"new_tags\": [\"suggested new tags that don\'t exist yet\"] }

RULES: 1. Choose matching tags from the list of available tags (if any) 2. IMPORTANT: ALWAYS suggest at least 2-3 new tags in \"new_tags\" to categorize the document! Examples of useful tags: - Document type: Invoice, Contract, Letter, Manual, Label, Warranty - Category: Finance, Technology, Hardware, Insurance, Health - Company/Brand: Samsung, Amazon, Telekom (if recognizable) - Status: Important, Archive, Filing 3. The title should be short and descriptive (max 50 characters) 4. Detect date, sender and document type from the content 5. For invoices: Look for invoice number, amount, company 6. Confidence indicates how certain the analysis is (0.0 = uncertain, 1.0 = certain)
IMPORTANT: The \"new_tags\" field should NEVER be empty! Always suggest relevant tags.
Respond ONLY with the JSON, no further explanation.
Billing service not ready. Please wait a moment and try again.
Product not found. Please try again later.
Not a Paperless server. The /api/ endpoint was not found.
Server not responding (Bad Gateway). Is Paperless running?
Server timeout. The server is taking too long to respond.
Server \"%1$s\" not found. Check if you are on the correct network.
Server \"%1$s\" not found. Check the address for typos.
SSL certificate invalid or expired. Check the server configuration.
SSL connection failed. Server may not support HTTPS.
SSL certificate could not be verified.
Secure connection not possible. Check the SSL configuration.
Timeout. Server is not responding or too slow.
Connection refused. Is the server running on this port?
Connection reset. The server closed the connection.
Connection failed. Check if the server is running.
No network connection. Please check your internet connection.
Unexpected response from server (%1$d). Is this a Paperless-ngx server?
Server unreachable at \"%1$s\". Please check the address and network connection.
Timeout. Server is not reachable or too slow.
Connection refused. Check if the server is running and reachable.
Server has an /api/ interface, but it is not a Paperless-ngx server.
First image could not be processed
Cannot open input stream for URI
